sentence: …Speaker, during Roll Call No. 320 on the House  Amendment to S. 1071, I mistakenly recorded my vote as yea when I  should have voted nay.                             PERSONAL EXPLANATION
…Call No. 78, AYE on Roll Call No. 79, NO  on Roll Call No. 80, NO on Roll Call No. 81, NO on Roll Call No. 82,  and NAY on Roll Call No. 83.                             personal explanation
…recorded on Roll Call Nos. 57 and  58 today. Had I been present, I would have voted YEA on Roll Call No.  57 and YEA on Roll Call No. 58.                             personal explanation
…floor and missed Roll  Call Nos. 306 and 307. Had I been present, I would have voted YEA on  Roll Call No. 306 and YEA on Roll Call No. 307.                             personal explanation

…would have  voted YEA on the Motion to Recommit H.R. 3668 and NAY on H.R. 3668,  Improving Interagency Coordination for Pipeline Reviews Act.                             personal explanation
